    • Method Detail

      • getServerIcon

        public static org.bukkit.util.CachedServerIcon getServerIcon()

        Gets an instance of the server's default server-icon.

        Returns:
        the default server-icon; null values may be used by the implementation to indicate no defined icon, but this behavior is not guaranteed

      • loadServerIcon

        public static org.bukkit.util.CachedServerIcon loadServerIcon(java.io.File file)

        Loads an image from a file, and returns a cached image for the specific server-icon.

        Size and type are implementation defined. An incompatible file is guaranteed to throw an implementation-defined Exception.

        Parameters:
        file - the file to load the from
        Returns:
        a cached server-icon that can be used for a ServerListPingEvent
        Throws:
        - if image is null
        - if the image does not meet current server server-icon specifications
        See Also:
        Exception

      • loadServerIcon

        public static org.bukkit.util.CachedServerIcon loadServerIcon(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)

        Creates a cached server-icon for the specific image.

        Size and type are implementation defined. An incompatible file is guaranteed to throw an implementation-defined Exception.

        Parameters:
        image - the image to use
        Returns:
        a cached server-icon that can be used for a ServerListPingEvent
        Throws:
        - if image is null
        - if the image does not meet current server server-icon specifications
        See Also:
        Exception
